meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Angie Rasmussen Brian Keele Troy Senik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6864.

td.p: Angie Rasmussen, a virologist from Seattle, Washington
Brian Keele, an architectural project manager from Atlanta, Georgia
Troy Senik, a newspaper columnist from Westlake Village, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,700)

tr.td: THE BOOK OF MORMONS
QUIRKY NEWS
SPACED OUT
A SOFT TOUCH
PLACES IN COLORADO
ANGELS & DEMONS

Stephenie Meyer

BrianAngie
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Troy
Brian
Angie
AN IMMODEST PROPOSAL
(Alex: You folks have to identify the man proposing.)
LITERARY GEMS
MOVIEMAKERS
'80s FASHION
PUT ON YOUR NEON
& SPAN "D_X"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with a "D" and end with an "X".)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
